Title: Requires state employees and certain public officials attend annual implicit bias training
Summary: Requires state employees and the governor, lieutenant governor, attorney general, comptroller, and members of the legislature attend annual implicit bias training provided by the legislative ethics commission.
LawCode: Add ยง27-f, Lab L; amd ยง80, Leg L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the labor law and the legislative law, in relation to requiring state employees and certain public officials attend annual implicit bias training
